findings.title: Dead Code Elimination
findings.description: Dead code in Solidity contracts can make them harder to understand and maintain, increasing deployment and interaction costs.

findings.title: Local Scope Variable Shadowing
findings.description: Local variables with the same name as outer scope variables can lead to confusion and unintended consequences.

findings.title: Stable Compiler Version
findings.description: Not locking the pragma version can result in unexpected compiler versions, leading to vulnerabilities and undiscovered bugs.
